paragraphs.title: FPS Total Inbound Volumes
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select  'Total Inbound' as "Type", COALESCE(sum("credit_count"),0) as "Volume of Credits", COALESCE(sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume of Debits", COALESCE(sum("credit_amount"),0) as "Credit value", COALESCE(sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Debit value",  COALESCE(sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume Total",  COALESCE(sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" not in ('RJCT', 'REV') and "direction" = 'I' ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery}

paragraphs.title: FPS Total Outbound Volumes
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select  'Total Outbound' as "Type", COALESCE(sum("credit_count"),0) as "Volume of Credits", COALESCE(sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume of Debits", COALESCE(sum("credit_amount"),0) as "Credit value", COALESCE(sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Debit value",  COALESCE(sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume Total",  COALESCE(sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" not in ('RJCT', 'REV') and  "direction" = 'O' ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery}

paragraphs.title: FPS Net Totals
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select  'Net Totals' as "Type", COALESCE(sum("credit_count"),0) as "Volume of Credits", COALESCE(sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume of Debits", COALESCE(sum("credit_amount"),0) as "Credit value", COALESCE(sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Debit value",  COALESCE(sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count"),0) as "Volume Total",  COALESCE(sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount"),0) as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" not in ('RJCT', 'REV') ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery}

paragraphs.title: FPS Total Other Exceptions
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select "report_group" as "Type", "direction" as "Direction", sum("credit_count") as "Volume of Credits", sum("debit_count") as "Volume of Debits", sum("credit_amount") as "Credit value", sum("debit_amount") as "Debit value",  sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count") as "Volume Total",  sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount") as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" in ('RJCT', 'REV')  ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery} group by "report_group","direction"
